publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2362 Robin Harper: Counting Scotland’s Carbon—That the Parliament notes the vital importance of accurate and comprehensive information on greenhouse gas emissions; believes that we will never know how successful our efforts to tackle climate change are without such data, and urges the Scottish Government to account for the carbon impact of imports into Scotland and of Scotland’s shipping and flights when publishing information about emissions.
S3M-2362 Counting Scotland’s Carbon (lodged on 1 August 2008) Bill Kidd*, Rob Gibson*, Patrick Harvie*
